original_title: Two minor earthquakes in two areas
original_body_lines: Two minor earthquakes have been reported in two areas of the country within a few hours.
According to the Geological Survey and Mines Bureau (GSMB) a minor earthquake of magnitude 2.6 was reported in the Kirinda area yesterday.
Also, a minor earthquake of magnitude 3 on the Richter scale was reported from the Gomarankadawala area early this morning.
